properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 7:27PM CST until January 4 at 11:20AM CST by NWS Huntsville AL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama...

Flint River at Brownsboro affecting Madison County

The Flood Warning continues for
the Flint River at Brownsboro.
* until Saturday morning.
* At 6 PM Thursday the stage was 10.2 feet and rising.
* Flood Stage is 17.0 feet.
* Minor Flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above Flood Stage by by daybreak tomorrow and crest
near 18.5 feet by early tomorrow afternoon. The river will fall
below Flood Stage by early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 19.0 feet...Water begins to flood yards on the
downstream side of the Brownsboro Road bridge.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.9 feet
on Mar 9 2019.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to
recognize flood dangers. If while driving you see water over a road,
turn around, don't drown! The water depth may be too great to allow
your vehicle to cross. Additional information is available at
http://water.weather.gov. Once there, click on the Tennessee Valley
to view local river information.
